node.title: Php разработчик
.net developer
node.text:
#вакансия # C# #Москва #fulltime#офис 
Software Engineer/Developer (C#)
Международная ИТ компания приглашает к себе в команду С# Developer с опытом от года.
Responsibilities:
Ability to reproduce and analyze issue according requirements and design. Review similar behavioral and relation with other components in system.
Clarify scope of changes and review with Technical expert, Product Owner if needed.
Develop business software in according standard and work procedures.
Participate in review code process.
Support and create and review Unit Tests, Automated tests
Work closely with Team, attend all Agile activities

Skills:
Understanding of object oriented development principles required, client-server architecture.
Good knowledge of C#, .Net, WCF, XML, JSON, REST (required)
Knowledge of SQL Server
Angular or ASP (desired)
Jira, TFS, Git (desired)
Reading/writing English – intermediate
Условия: 130 000 RUR фикс до вычета налогов + ДМС (со стоматологией) + страхование жизни + изучение англ в офисе + бонус.
КОНТАКТЫ:
Юлия Вербицкая: @julia_bright или  julia@brightis.ru
+7(926) 478-30-02
